title: SOLD 1908 General Photo Co. St. Louis Browns Postcard (Rube Waddell & Bobby Wallace)
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: SOLD 1908 General Photo Co. St. Louis Browns Postcard (Rube Waddell & Bobby Wallace)

posts.post_content: Great postcard Jeff, images of Waddell are really tough to find.  Good luck with the sale!

Thanks Jim! Got some wiggle room on this fine postcard, throw me a number if any of you fine members are interested!
Jeff

As requested a scan of the back has been added. Forgot it was postally unused, it's a real beauty!
Jeff

Cut $350 off the price... first come, first served on this beauty!
Jeff

Bump and price drop for Rube and the boys. PM with interest or offers. Cheers!
Jeff

Forgot about Rube, let's give him a bump!
Jeff

very nice postcard.

Good luck with it
Thanks Jeff! Deal of the day, $1100 shipped (I've turned down higher offers LOL) First come and first served! Cheers!
